text:
See http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=log4j-dev&m=111403513616157&w=2

RollingFileAppender behavior in log4j prior to the patch is inaccurate on Windows since File.length may 
give a cached length while a file is open for writing.  This changes associated with this bug cause 
o.a.l.r.RFA to maintain an accurate file length by counting write requests to the output stream and 
passing this length to the triggering policy.
